No Title. Two pen drawings: "Congress should drive Lincoln out of the White House; Compromise with the South slavery"; "God Save the Union!" [Elite support for compromise vs. military and working class sacrifice for Union]

No Title. Two pen drawings: "Congress should drive Lincoln out of the White House; Compromise with the South slavery"; "God Save the Union!" [Elite support for compromise vs. military and working class sacrifice for Union]
Two Pen Drawings: Signed P.Kramer. First, Anti-Lincoln because of his anti-slavery views. Second, Depicting McClellan carried off battlefield. Acquisition(?) date on front: Dec. 6, 1906.
